newsitem.title: FRANCE: BA /Rivaud only Air Liberte bidders.
newsitem.headline: BA /Rivaud only Air Liberte bidders.

text.p: A joint bid by British Airways Plc and Groupe Rivaud for ailing regional airline Air Liberte is the only one remaining on the table, Nouvelles Frontieres chairman Jacques Maillot said.

Maillot was heading a rival consortium which has withdrawn from the bidding. Richard Branson's Virgin Express and commercial pilot Fernand Denan also planed to make an offer, but they did not materialise.
In a statement, Maillot said that there had been a meeting at the Creteil commercial court on Wednesday.
He said that the "extraordinary disastrous financial situation" and the large amount of investment needed to turn Air Liberte around had prompted his withdrawal.
